# docker_org_team_member (Resource)

Manages Docker Hub organization team members.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `org_name` (String) The Docker Hub organization name.
- `team_name` (String) The team name.
- `username` (String) The username to add to the team.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource (org_name/team_name/username).
